subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner, seeded fifth and ranked 12th, lost his opening match at the Citi Open in Washington to 68th-ranked Steve Johnson, 6-7 (5), 6-3, 7-6 (6), despite hitting 29 aces. Kei Nishikori beat Sam Querrey, 6-4, 5-7, 6-4.
snippet: John Isner, seeded fifth and ranked 12th, lost his opening match at the Citi Open in Washington to 68th-ranked Steve Johnson, 6-7 (5), 6-3, 7-6 (6), despite hitting 29 aces. Kei Nishikori beat Sam Querrey, 6-4, 5-7, 6-4.
